channel.title: Wasteland Equipment guide
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wasteland Equipment guide" - Comments and Feedback on new wiki page

item.title: Re: Wasteland Equipment guide
item.content:encoded:
It a nice work, but it is done pretty heavily (on code level), especially the links.
The linking type you use is for external link, but could be done easier by using internal links.

Basic Internal Link

 [[[category:Link]]]

Example:

 [[[items:Letter of Marque]]]

Result:
Letter of Marque


Extened Internal Link

 [[[category:Link|Link Name]]]

Example:

 [[[items:Sword of the Reaper|My Sword of the Reaper]]]

Result:
My Sword of the Reaper

item.title: Wasteland Equipment guide
item.content:encoded:
Created a step-by-step page for the wasteland equipment assembly. Just drawing attention to it for comments and/or feedback.
Wasteland Equipment Step by Step
